author: jstrachan
msg: temporary patch so that System properties are available by default in the global variable scope.
So you can do ${user.home} inside a Jelly script. We'll include a better patch shortly using pluggable Scope objects that make it easier to configure this behaviour

author: jstrachan
msg: patched dependency list to work nicely with the new ID naming scheme for optional jars on projects

author: jstrachan
msg: patched the tag generation mechanism so that the HTML documentation in the javadoc appears nicely in the generated tag reference.

author: jstrachan
msg: added an example of using the <jsl:copy> tag
